title: Grateful Dead Live at Yale Bowl, Yale University on 1971-07-31
source: 2 Source Matrix by Dusborne;Soundboard (shnid:132730)SBD -> Master Reel -> CD,CD -> Samplitude Professional v10.02 -> Adobe Audition v1.5 -> FLAC; Audience (shnid:101438)Sources:I: AudMR > CD > EAC > WAV > SHN,II: AudMR > C > DAT > CD > EAC > WAV > SHN,single AKG 190E mic > Uher 4000 Report-L 5" Reel deck, 1/2 track tapes on a Revox A-700 (tweaked the head azimuth to match the original recording).  Signal fed into DigiDesign Pro Tools on a Macintosh with Audio Media III sound card. The only post processing was normalization.
